org.jgapcustomised

Interface SpeciationStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpeciationStrategyKMeans, SpeciationStrategyOriginal

    public interface SpeciationStrategy
    An interface for classes that implement a strategy for dividing genomes into distinct Species.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void respeciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList, java.util.List<Species> specieList, Genotype genotype)
      Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species, starting from scratch.
      void speciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList, java.util.List<Species> specieList, Genotype genotype)
      Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species.

    • Method Detail

      • respeciate

        void respeciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList,
              java.util.List<Species> specieList,
              Genotype genotype)
        Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species, starting from scratch.
        Parameters:
        genomeList - The list of genomes to speciate, must contain all genomes (including those that are already members of species in specieList.
        specieList - A list of species, which may be empty.
        genotype - The Genotype object performing evolution, speciation parameters may be obtained with genotype.Genotype.getConfiguration().Configuration.getSpeciationParms().

      • speciate

        void speciate(java.util.List<Chromosome> genomeList,
            java.util.List<Species> specieList,
            Genotype genotype)
        Speciates the genomes in genomeList into the provided species. Species may be added or removed, depending on the implementation.
        Parameters:
        genomeList - The list of genomes to speciate, must contain all genomes (including those that are already members of species in specieList.
        specieList - A list of species, which may be empty.
        genotype - The Genotype object performing evolution, speciation parameters may be obtained with genotype.Genotype.getConfiguration().Configuration.getSpeciationParms().
